div.class: inner col col24 first last id27391b9a-0871-42a5-ad5e-fbb35c0eb056

p.strong: THE HENDERSON COUNTY SHERIFF’S OFFICE WILL NOT OPEN FOR IN-PERSON BUSINESS BUT WILL BE TAKING PHONE CALLS TO HELP ANSWER QUESTIONS AND OFFER GUIDANCE ON TAX PAYMENTS, VEHICLE INSPECTIONS AND OTHER TRANSACTIONS. DURING NORMAL BUSINESS HOUR PLEASE CALL 270-826-2713 FOR INFORMATION. IF YOU HAVE AN EMERGENCY, DIAL 911.
THE HENDERSON COUNTY PVA WILL ALSO NOT TAKE WALK-IN CUSTOMERS BUT WILL HAVE PERSONNEL ANSWERING PHONES DURING NORMAL BUSINESS HOURS: PLEASE CALL 270-827-6024.
HENDERSON RECYCLING WILL NOT BE RECEIVING RECYCLING ITEMS UNTIL THE STATE OF EMERGENCY IS LIFTED. PLEASE DO NOT LEAVE ITEMS AT THE GATE.

strong.span: Henderson County Declaration of State of Emergency
